title: Did riot utterly break teambuilder matchmaking levels/elo?
body:
My first game after the patch, i get matched with four of the biggest scrubs i can ever remember encountering (since i was one myself) in a fully random teambuilder game. Two admitted to being lv22 at the start of the game, a third said they just hit 30. They had no idea what a "leash" was and accused me of being a crybaby and "needing handholding", proceeded to run off to ward (and die) during a gank, next lane stands still and watches me die in a 2v2 gank, ect. 
They proceed to be hilariously toxic in that special, pathetic and entirely un-annoying way unique to bronze teens for the rest of the game, each one blaming everyone else for how hard they are feeding.

Before this day, i had not even seen a lv22 in over two years.

Rito, why you break teambuilder matchmaking? Or is my luck just horrible?
